document.full_text: florida lawmakers gave final legislative approval on wednesday to a bill aimed at replacing teacher tenure with a merit-based system, in the latest clash between a u.s. state government and public employee unions.
document.title: florida set to replace teacher tenure with merit pay
lines_and_colors: florida lawmakers gave final legislative approval on wednesday to a bill aimed at replacing teacher tenure with a merit-based system, in the latest clash between a u.s. state government and public employee unions.
